Comments: Everything is complicated. I’m tired of having to contact customer service.

With your new system, we do not know if any of our books are backordered or missing. One of my students did not receive a book, nothing on the packing slip or the individual name list, told me a book was missing! I should not have to go back to my original order and check to see if each book I ordered was sent in the package. There should be a list of backordered/missing books so we can let students know. In the past, you would send a free book to any children that were waiting for their books to arrive.

With your new system, we do not know if any of our books are backordered or missing. One of my students did not receive a book, nothing on the packing slip or the individual name list, told me a book was missing! I should not have to go back to my original order and check to see if each book I ordered was sent in the package. There should be a list of backordered/missing books so we can let students know. In the past, you would send a free book to any children that were waiting for their books to arrive.

i ordered little circles for the carpet area for the children to sit on and another book was I guess on backorder they asked me to review book but i could not because we did not receive what will I be when I grow up maybe still on back order?
no, I am usually very pleased with them.
Your customer service representative was very helpful and was able to fix my mistake through the chat feature. Thanks!
I received a response to my inquiry very quickly.
I was hoping that after being a scholastic book customer for thirty years...ordering nearly every month, that we could have worked out something or at least pursued a solution to the question.
The individual I talked to was very efficient and helped me right away.
Super sweet and very helpful! Thank you!

This was my first time ordering since the beginning of last year when it took an enormous amount of time to receive orders. This order arrived in a very timely manner but was missing a student order. The representative gave me a new order number and said the books would arrive in 7-10 days. Thank you!
She was helpful and did a great job.
Contact UPS for me. Have them keep the package and I will pick it up. I will expect Scholastic to pay the fee for pick up.
The first representative didn't look close enough at my order to see that my item was arriving later than I thought
I was much happier than last year when it came to resolving the tax on my order.  I sincerely hope that continues this year!  :)
I am missing a book and have not heard back from anyone.
I am missing a book and have not heard back from anyone.
Instead of requesting a customer number, maybe ask IF the person ordering has a customer number, since it isn't a requirement to place an order.
I had an order totalling 100 dollars.  I thought I would get 2 free packs of three.  Megan said to go ahead and order two, but the page wouldn't let me choose two.  I was too tired to try again!!
I've contacted a few times about my wish list not being available to parents. So far, no one has fixed my problem. I've been told IT is looking into it. Haven't heard anything yet.

Teachers are already expected to spend too much money out of pocket on our classrooms, the fact that Scholastic is asking us to spend another $6.50 of our OWN money for shipping each month is ridiculous. I get it, you're priority is getting items here fast since shipping has been a complete mess since Covid, but now you're going to lose business. We can't guarantee that we will get even ONE order from students, especially in low income areas such as mine. And they said that if one student orders online the class won't have to pay shipping, well is that because the parent of that child has already paid it?! Come on, Scholastic. Go back to what it used to be like. I am not willing to continue with book orders now that you're requiring this.

Nothing... I just hesitate to give the highest marks because my concern is not finished yet. The customer care professional that I talked to this morning did a great job, but I am waiting now for the book that needs to be sent home to the student to arrive at my classroom.
I was missing a book from my order. Ready to Catch Magic 33k1 for violet Yeager.
I never received my scholastic book order. Scholastic has not helped to resolve...I've contacted the UPS company to try to resolve.
Glad the order came quickly, and I was able to get help with the online chat session.
The customer service rep was kind and easy to talk to, she seemed happy to help and resolved the issue quickly.
Paying for postage to ship back a set of books that was ordered in duplicate doesn’t seem very cost effective. What other options do you off without making us pay more?
Books were attempted to be delivered during our Fall break.  We were not in school for a week.  After 2 attempts the package was left at the post office and now I have no idea how to get it.

When I made my order it said I could go to the dollar bargain or something but then would t let me add the books. So I asked on the chat feature about this and I couldn't get an answer.  I also asked how I could order new diary if a whimsy kid book. No response.

When I made my order it said I could go to the dollar bargain or something but then would t let me add the books. So I asked on the chat feature about this and I couldn't get an answer.  I also asked how I could order new diary if a whimsy kid book. No response.
Find a way to keep books on the flyer at either $1 or $1.50.
Subcategory: Search Function/Discrepancy Flyer vs Website Info

Comments: I had TWO families that ordered well over $25 and accidently did not choose their $5 "free book bonus offer" for September orders.  I was trying to find a way for them to get credit for that.  Was told that it couldn't be done.  That I had to contact them and have them contact Scholastic.  I do not have time to do that, which Scholastic should know if we are full time teachers!  I will just use my own BONUS POINTS to make it right with the two families.

The Customer Service rep did a great job and the missing book is being sent. My packaging slip was incorrect because it showed that my items were sold to another teacher in a nearby city. The SHIP TO: address was correct. My credit card was also charged correctly so I am not sure why it printed as such.
Parent said they will make a call to scholastic to check for order.
My son got a flyer for his school book fair, and we were trying to order a few items but we couldn’t find them so we contacted costumer service but we got the same results
Subcategory: Search Function/Discrepancy Flyer vs Website Info

Comments: If a representative doesn't know an answer to the problem, then seek help or find someone who may know.
delay in solving the issue completely
I should not have tried to do the chat-- there is no way to step away for a minute and then come back-- when I switched to email, problem was solved easily.

Order was delivered quickly. They did remove the tax after it shipped as they do have our district tax id on file. I appreciate the service. The books will be donated to every mother of a newborn in our local hospital through 2023.
I still cannot locate my class code

I was "disconnected" THREE times while talking on chat.  It seems that as soon as the agent thought the problem was handled, they closed the chat without confirming.  I had to reconnect three times (the third disconnect, I didn't have to re-initiate a chat, thankfully.)  Each time I talked to a new person and each time the problem was a result of the previous person's attempts to solve. Of all the years I have worked with Scholastic, this was the worst chat experience I've had.  Yikes!

I was "disconnected" THREE times while talking on chat.  It seems that as soon as the agent thought the problem was handled, they closed the chat without confirming.  I had to reconnect three times (the third disconnect, I didn't have to re-initiate a chat, thankfully.)  Each time I talked to a new person and each time the problem was a result of the previous person's attempts to solve. Of all the years I have worked with Scholastic, this was the worst chat experience I've had.  Yikes!
I really appreciate the fact that I can do a live chat because I can't talk on the phone with a classroom of children. It was more convenient and fast.

Unfortunately, I only had 1 student order this month for $9.  The student who submitted the order is of a low income family and he gave me a money order for the amount.  My call was to inquire if the shipping fee could be waved for this unique situation.  The customer service rep. said no.  The Scholastic Book Fair will be on our campus next week.  Could the student use the money order to purchase a book from the Book Fair?

Unfortunately, I only had 1 student order this month for $9.  The student who submitted the order is of a low income family and he gave me a money order for the amount.  My call was to inquire if the shipping fee could be waved for this unique situation.  The customer service rep. said no.  The Scholastic Book Fair will be on our campus next week.  Could the student use the money order to purchase a book from the Book Fair?
so kind and got the job done
Finding the information to contact you when issues arise.

I was told that I would be getting an email after my issue was looked into and I never got an email. There has been no resolution at all and now I get this survey. I will most likely not be using Scholastic again. I placed a large order and I was charged twice for it which has put my company card at its monthly limit so I cannot buy snacks for our preschool on it. Very bad experience with scholastic.

I was told that I would be getting an email after my issue was looked into and I never got an email. There has been no resolution at all and now I get this survey. I will most likely not be using Scholastic again. I placed a large order and I was charged twice for it which has put my company card at its monthly limit so I cannot buy snacks for our preschool on it. Very bad experience with scholastic.
I didn’t get a clear answer or email stating if the book was being sent out to replace the damaged book.
I didn’t get a clear answer or email stating if the book was being sent out to replace the damaged book.
The agent was quick and knowledgeable when answering my question.
I can't seem to find my $10 to spend right now and a place where I can get my 5 free books.

I have been waiting for a invoice to give to my person to get my bill paid and it's been about a month with no invoice.  I always pay with a purchase order so they was pay the bill until the school receives an invoice.  Please help fix this problem so I can see to it that the bill gets paid in a timely manner.
The conversation was just ended. I have not received a confirmation email regarding the new book order that was forgotten from the initial order.
The conversation was just ended. I have not received a confirmation email regarding the new book order that was forgotten from the initial order.

I am a substitute  teacher working every day in different classrooms. I'm not assigned  to a specific class but I feel that it would be beneficial  to have a teacher account so I can order books to fill in the free time. Thank you!
It was the most efficient vans helpful call I have ever made to scholastic!  And I loved how quickly my order shipped too.  Thank you!
Quicker responses and more clarification but I am very happy with my interaction and the end result
The person on the chat was very helpful and quick!

I am so pleased with the results. I forgot to add my promo code to earn 500 bonus points with my first order for this school year. The representative was able to add the code to my order so I could still earn the bonus points. THANKS!

I contacted the chat line because my account says I have a balance due. I mailed in the check almost 2 weeks ago so it should have made it there in plenty of time. The person on the chat line could not help me with whether or not the check had arrived.

A message copied from the website said parents can use READS code for free $5 book. Did not state only online. Parent paid by check and deducted the $5. Scholastic did not honor the code, making a delay in the order.
It would of been helpful if the first person who replied to me email would of been able to help.

Somehow my free book pack and $10 book rewards did not go through on my order so I emailed the company and I got a quick response saying they would be happy to get them sent to me. Excellent customer service.
I love the wonderful customer service from Scholastic! Thank you.
I received a quick answer to an unusual question.
I don't think the online chat was what helped. I think it was the phone support from Kevin. HE made the difference. If it was just chat, well, I might not have ordered to the level I did.

Last spring, you sent me an email with a code to use with my first order. The code offered extra bonus points if I ordered during September.  Well I forgot to use the code, The email should have been sent at the beginning of the school year.
We really appreciate the quick response and solution.
They were very responsive and resolved my issue quickly.
Everyone was amazing and quickly responded thank you
Scholastic is taking advantage of and is ripping off childrent. not much, I am waiting for corporate to respond to my email.
The costumer Service was great! I was very satisfied with how they helped. 10/10!

I emailed about a shipping balance on my account. I had online orders and a parent that sent in a check that I mailed separately. I don’t understand why I still have a shipping balance? If a parent sends in a check do they not receive free shipping as well? I had this happen before and the fee was taken off. I assumed it was a mistake. If parents who send in checks are always charged shipping I would like to know, because I am not a parent and only see the teacher side. I searched on the website and the envelope before mailing and there was no information on it about a shipping fee if a parent sends in a check. I don’t understand how the check system works and do not want to pay out of MY OWN pocket for a shipping charge for a parent.   Thank you, Jennifer Hunt

I emailed about a shipping balance on my account. I had online orders and a parent that sent in a check that I mailed separately. I don’t understand why I still have a shipping balance? An agent I spoke to last week, changed my teacher account to a parent account.  I was able to get it changed back to a teacher account, but all my bonus points are gone and my order history.
Subcategory: Log In Parent vs Teacher Account

Comments: I really appreciated the prompt response!
She was very helpful and quick, I was able to take care of the problem while the kids were at lunch.
It was a little confusing to order from different scholastic entities- clubs vs teacher store
It took so long for the assistant to respond that we disconnected several times.

I have an outstanging balance from 2019 from a parent order where a check was sent in and not received.  I was not even aware this was an issue until I tried to login to submit a current order at the end of the year last year.  They said they would take care of it and then they placed the order..  Due to Covid, we did not use Scholastic for 2 years. Now today I tried to login to submit an order and the same thing. My account is not available due to this past balance that was supposedly resolved last year.  I tried to call and resolve this but was told they can't help me, that i needed to reach out to collections.  I did so a few minutes ago and they can't help me either unless I pay $68.  This was a parent order, not mine. I am an educator barely making it by as it is. I do not have $70 to pay this.  I have student orders waiting that I cannot fulfil now. I am not sure what to do or who can help with this.  Thank you

I am not sure what to do or who can help with this.  Thank you
The support person took a long time to respond.
Y’all do a great job. Thank you my kids love y’all books. 🙂
I have always been able to purchase tax exempt for school.  This time I was told I would have to send in a new tax exempt form and you would refund the tax.

I didn't have a problem but a suggestion. However, I was sent a generic copy and paste reply to my suggestion as if you all didn't really care about my suggestion, nor tell me who would eventually receive my suggestion.
I had the wrong book sent with the order. The correction was very easy, however that would be the only thing that could have been better.

I wish there was a system to share immediately that my request has been taken care of. There is no confirmation, we just take the representative's word that it's been taken care of. Overall, my representative was helpful and efficient!

Make sure all books are included in order before sending.  Organizing books by students would be EXTREMELY helpful.  It takes a ton of my time to go through all the books and make sure each child's order has been filled properly.

Make sure all books are included in order before sending.  Organizing books by students would be EXTREMELY helpful.  It takes a ton of my time to go through all the books and make sure each child's order has been filled properly.
Realized that I was chatting about a book order and not send me to three different people.

I know with the cost of shipping, it is hard to do free shipping.  In the future, it might be a good idea to allow teachers to add to an order after it had been submitted.  We are always going to have a kiddo that forgets.  I hate punishing them for something that they just are mature enough to do.
Been more helpful with the problem that had occured.
I got a quick and applicable answer to my question! Super useful!
She was kind and helpful in getting my issue resolved quickly.
Every person I talked to was so extremely kind and helpful. They ever congratulated me on my first year of teaching. The customer service was top notch!
Customer Service was very helpful and quick.
Waiting for the invoice to make sure our tax exemption is applied.  Received a duplicate order, trying to return the 2nd order and get a credit back on my account.

When I sent an email with a question about our school being tax exempt, had responses from at least 3 different people and then mulriple emails.  I placed an order online with a Purchase Order. It seems when I sent the purchase order in then a 2nd order was placed.   Working to return te duplicate and get credit back.

When I sent an email with a question about our school being tax exempt, had responses from at least 3 different people and then mulriple emails.  I placed an order online with a Purchase Order. It seems when I sent the purchase order in then a 2nd order was placed.   Working to return te duplicate and get credit back.
I do not like how we now have to pay for shipping if don't get to a total.
Thanks for resolving the issue of the missing book pack "Dragon Girls" quickly! I was surprised to see the box within 3 days!
I would like to be sent paper catalogs with each order so I am prepared for the next month. I had to request them so now I am waiting to send them out.
I requested a quote for books in my cart. On Wedenesday, the live chat agent said that I would receive my quote within 48 hours. It's been well over that.
I appreciate the quick response in replacing damaged books. However, had they been properly packed, there might not have been any issue to begin with.
I was sent the wrong book and it was easy and quick to get the proper book to the parent whom had ordered it. Thank you.

As always, customer support is helpful and understanding. I have never had to send a single item back that was sent in error. Scholastic has always been kind by donating those items to the classroom. Thank you!

i find parts of the website hard to navigate.  I couldn't figure out how to use my bonus points rather than pay, and. book I wanted for free (it was only $5) wouldn't come up when I put the number in..
Subcategory: Search Function/Discrepancy Flyer vs Website Info

Comments: Bring back the dollar books and $10 book packs.
My account was accidentally switched from teacher to parents. The customer service representative solved my issue in just a few minutes!
Subcategory: Log In Parent vs Teacher Account

Comments: I put $30 into e wallet. My daughter spent 15 and was told she only had a dollar left. I tried to contact support and they said they couldn’t help with e wallet issues. I logged onto my account and found another transaction was showing in my daughters account that she didn’t make.  I have her receipt showing she only spent 15 so I’m not sure why scholastic couldn’t help me figure out The issue.

I put $30 into e wallet. My daughter spent 15 and was told she only had a dollar left. I tried to contact support and they said they couldn’t help with e wallet issues. I logged onto my account and found another transaction was showing in my daughters account that she didn’t make.  I have her receipt showing she only spent 15 so I’m not sure why scholastic couldn’t help me figure out The issue.
Not make me pay shipping to return an incorrect order . $16?!?  Ridiculous.
The person was fine.  The chat feature stinks! It kept deleting the message I was typing.  Very frustrating.
The order was not sent to the correct address. It was sent to the address of a student I had last year. The parent emailed me and the package is at her house.

I forgot to add bonus point items to my order and asked if there was a way to add them or if the shipping fee could be waived. I was told I had to wait until I order again to have the fee waived and the items could not be added to my current order. I was very disappointed because I have been a Scholastic teacher for more than 30 years and the order I had just submitted was a rather large one.

I forgot to add bonus point items to my order and asked if there was a way to add them or if the shipping fee could be waived. I was told I had to wait until I order again to have the fee waived and the items could not be added to my current order. I was very disappointed because I have been a Scholastic teacher for more than 30 years and the order I had just submitted was a rather large one.
The customer service that I received through the Chat on Friday was very fast and effective. I appreciated the timeliness and kindness of the representative.
Katrina was very helpful and kind.
Received wrong item and bonus books were missing.
The response was fast. It was my fault information was missing in the first email. There was no questions asked and my missing books were shipped.
Could not get online payment to go through. Live operator said she could not help me. Transferred me to secure line. Round and around .... Still haven't paid.

I do not have an unlimited amount of time to deal with continued issues. I called, received information to problem solve, and the issues remained. I paid the difference but  dissatisfied. Too many issues over the years...😥

Website that allows for system override from customer service (dollar book site has glitches for customers who qualified but missed the tab when ordering). The dollar site seems to be intentionally difficult to access for teachers with qualifying orders. A way for your company to save money??? I have be a customer for 19 years and in recent years I feel less satisfied with products and services. You should value teachers and our wishes or unfortunately we will stop ordering (even if that means providing less books for students) as we spend so much of our own money to pay for classroom books.
We couldn’t use my “reads” coupon . It kept saying it was expired. When it was a promo at the top of your website
Thank you for making it easy to rectify a packing mistake to get the correctly ordered books.

I wondered if you had posters that you could send the school announcing you are accepting application for art and writing awards.  It would be great to put them around the school so students know more about it.
Nobody ever contacted me. I was able to resolve it on my own on my phone app but not on your website on a computer

I am still not listed as a teacher at my school when parents use the search code.  I provide parents with a link and my classroom code, but sometimes they just go in and search by the school and they can't find me.  It has resulted in them putting their orders in with other teachers.

I think it would be great if orders are combined for the month in terms of the points system. I often have a small group interested in the first book order and then many more once the books arrive. I would love to be about to combine my September orders for points as I put out two opportunities to order the first month. But it's extra work and even though my monthly total could reach 300, my points earned are not maximized.

That book that was not in my order due to being not in stock, should be shipped to me free at no charge! When my order was altered due to a book not being in stock. I wish I would have been notified. Instead, I thought one of the books I ordered was lost.

That book that was not in my order due to being not in stock, should be shipped to me free at no charge! When my order was altered due to a book not being in stock. I wish I would have been notified. Instead, I thought one of the books I ordered was lost.

I recently moved to Texas from Alabama and had a baby so I took this school year off. I was ordering books for my classroom next year using my points and selected to have them sent to my home address. I am 100% sure that I did that and actually attempted to put my account as homeschool to have my previous school removed. When I submitted my order it said my account had to be verified and when they did that, it defaulted to my old school instead of my new home address and so they sent it to my old school in Alabama. I immediately messaged you and said it was sent to the wrong address. The first person was very nice and said they would get it fixed and sent to my home address and to just send them the address. The next 4 different people that responded to me after that basically told me I was out of luck because I can’t use my teacher account or my points that I earned because I’m not a full time teacher and that it was too late to cancel the order or change it and that it would be sent to Alabama and that I need to pay to have my school send it to me. So I payed $7 in shipping for it to be sent 700 miles away from me and will have to pay to have it shipped from the school as well. I have been told multiple times that I didn’t select the right shipping but I am 100% sure that I typed my Texas address in and selected home address because I did not plan to drive 700 miles to pick up 5 books. I did not appreciate that I was told it could be fixed until I said I wasn’t teaching and then all of a sudden it couldn’t be fixed. Also it is very confusing to have so many different people sending different responses. This whole experience was very frustrating.

Different parts of website are hard to navigate. Like book club vs teacher site, hard to figure out which you are in
The people I spoke with were helpful. But I was on hold for almost 30 minutes while the person was getting the okay from the supervisor regarding a 7 dollar problem. That's ridiculous.

The website is a little difficult to navigate. As a teacher, when checking out, I wish it was a smoother process ($10 to spend, free books, $1 books availability) I actually had to go back and remove a book which I had thought the $10 would be applied to only to add it again. The whole process took me at least 30 minutes adding and removing and adding books.
I had just placed an order 5 minutes prior and wanted to add 1 book but the rep said they couldn’t do that.
have mailing address easily found ion online order page
I appreciated the quick response I received from Meagan, Case ID: 8431510  when I messaged that right after entering my students' order, I realized that I had forgotten to enter a code for points.

My parent was forced to reorder because the rep (Amy) did not inform me of this before cancelling her order. She went in to reorder and now her total is doubled. Amy had reassured me that she would not be charged
The customer service representative was extremely helpful.
Your agent answered my question and fixed my situation immediately.  I was very pleased.  Thank you so much.

I have been a Scholastic Book Club teacher for 20 years.  My name is not listed as a teacher for my school and seems to be unable to be fixed.  Therefore, when my families try to look up name, instead of using the information/class code that I have provided to them, they end up placing orders with another teacher in my district whose name is familiar to them.
I ordered books some time in August. I haven’t received my orders yet.
Sorry, I couldn’t get back to the chat box to say thank you!

I jumped on Scholastic to order books for the holiday for my 2nd and 3rd grade Reading intervention.  New Position.  As a former classroom teacher 27 years- I always ordered from your company.  Many years buying the holiday books for 1.00 for my students.  When I tried to find them, the big banner stated 1.00 books will open with a 75.00 classroom order.  I do not place CLASSROOM orders because I am now a Reading Intervention teacher. I planned on using my points to fill my new Intervention library with lower level books for my students.  I shouldn't have to order 75.00 worth of books to receive the 1.00 deal on books.
Packing slip looked like a book had shipped and it had not. Please mark if an item is out of stock to help the teacher. Service was great! Thank you!
I didnt feel as though the solution and response was accurate
I am going to let the parent follow up as my concern about their order was not necessarily addressed.
I emailed an issue on Thursday evening and had an answer in my in-box on Friday morning

I appreciate the timely response to my email. As you know the kids are so excited to receive their Scholastic orders, and I'm happy I can tell my daughter right away after school that she's receiving a replacement. Thank you!
It would be nice if a tax exempt company didn't have to email to get tax removed.
I wished the person would have given more details when dealing with my problem.
The response time was very quick, the information helped solve my problem.
I am missing 2 books from my most recent order (#70348682), The Good, the Bad and the Spooky (2 copies).  I did not hear when they would be arriving or if they would  be arriving late.
Everything went smooth, quick ship for the book that was missing.
very helpful.....I hope I feel the same when I receive my order and that is correct
Make it easier to find book titles in spanish... I teach Dual language imersion and its hard to find books even some that I know Scholastic carries because I have seen or used them.
I was very impressed with how fast I was contacted. How quickly I received additional responses with my questions! It was great! Thank you!
Super helpful and quick response. Thank you so much!!

I usually purchase books for the entire year all at once so they can be handed out on certain holidays. I had a difficult time finding books I used to purchase. It's like they aren't available until that certain holiday rolls around and sometimes, that's not enough time to get them ordered when we're crazy busy (which is why I order early for the entire year so I don't forget). The books are also much more expensive and it's hard to find books for all students on a budget anymore.

If a parent submits an order using the paper forms and hand it in with their check, it does not include tax money.  I am not going to pay their tax to complete the order.  I have a tax exempt form and was questioning how I can use that.  I was directed to a different email.
Thank you for the quick turnover time!

As librarian of our school, the books I purchase are for the school library. It would be helpful if I did not have to call after receiving my orders to have the sales tax removed from my orders. I do have a tax exempt ID on file with my account.
I had trouble with my first order, receiving one wrong book and not receiving two books.  Customer service was so fast to respond to my issue.  Thanks so much!

I have received the books that were missing from my order.  However, I had to spend a great deal of time figuring out which books were missing, contact the company, have them re-ordered, only to have them arrive a day later.  The packing slip should show the books that are one back order.

Is it possible to pack student orders together, like all of "Johnny's" books together, "Susie's" books together, etc?  It takes a few minutes to check off that all books are there and put the orders together.  I teach kindergarten and I do not have an aide, so without staying after school or giving up prep time, it's hard to find time to organize and pull the books.  Tonight it took me nearly a half an hour to get them  sorted.  Not a huge deal, but it would be helpful! Also my books were very much thrown in the box this time, one title was bent.  It is going to be okay, I set something very heavy to try to minimize the bend.  Just FYI. Thank you!
Amazing and quick response to question
A scholastic book I bought from another merchant is defective (missing pages)
It felt good to get a quick response and not have to do the "run around" like in a lot of other businesses.  Thank you.
I called to let you know that I have retired. The representative helped my transfer my points to another teacher.

I just received my $300 September book order. The packing slip was missing to tell my why one of my books was missing. I tried to look online to see why one of my students books was missing so I could  tell him when all the other kids go their books and he did not. My online order did not tell me any information about the missing book. I had to call and ask. The lady told me that the book is backordered. I REALLY hope that I do not need to call each time a book is missing. PLEASE use the paper slip in the box OR send me an email about any backordered books.

Thank you for the quick reply in online chat and for solving the problem of my missing book so quickly!
I moved schools and have been requesting the paper flyers.  Have not received any since August. Problem hasn't been resolved yet.
The representative was very polite and helpful.
I do not - my question was answered completely and in a timely manner.
They dealt with a shipping mistake quickly and easily.

I have one email address that is apparently connected to three accounts (book fair chair, parent account, teacher account) but I cannot find my teacher account anymore. Apparently it no longer exists. Kind of annoying since I'm trying to order books for some students. You could have solved my issue. The customer service rep couldn't assist me so she gave me a phone number to try to call on my own. Would have appreciated a better answer and not had to make a separate phone call, which i haven't done yet.
Agent was fine. Just wish  I would have received notice about items being on back order beforehand so I didn't have to use the chat.

I do not know if it will be okay until I get my book orders. For some reason, my book box address does not have a PO Box# on it even though my book flyer address has the PO box. So the Post Office decided to not deliver any mail to addresses missing POs. I was unable to correct my address online and needed to have our school secretaries call which took too long because they are busy. I have unhappy parents now that have been waiting for orders that have been returned 2 times.

I was disconnected from the rep today and unable to let her know what my $10 in free book picks were.  For some reason, they did not register with my initial order 70237604.  The rep on 9/28 just told me to contact the post office.  We solved the mystery here at school.  I am not happy with the website and that my freebie books were not included with my main order.

Your agents were very helpful, but I think I’m still Getting multiple copies of the flyers that I tried not to get.
Codes that work online rather than having me email.

I was very satisfied by the response but it would have been helpful if a note had been on my invoice about additional boxes coming.  In the past, that has been on emails saying the books are on the way.

My school has an online order going right now and we have passed the $75 mark so I was hoping to get to see the new Dollar store so I can let my teachers know what books are available. With the directions I was given I was not able to see that nor was I even able to see our current orders. I have received the emails so I know they are happening but nothing shows under my account.

I did not have time to stay in the live chat, as I was messaging during my lunch. The representative did not answer my question at all when I looked at the transcript and simply directed me to the email address. I've just sent the following email to bookclubs@scholastic:  Hi there!  I placed an order yesterday and was given the choice of which 5-pack to choose for my $100 reward, but was not given the option to spend my $10 reward that comes with placing any order. Could you let me know how to go about redeeming that $10 reward? Thank you!

I work in a very low income school district. It is very rare that I will get book orders. I received an order from one of my students, but was going to be charged $6.50 in shipping, which I would have had to pay out of my own pocket. I spend a lot of money on my students already. I do not think that it is right to charge for shipping, no matter what your book order cost is. I had to return the money to the student and tell him I couldn't place his order. Very upset that this had to happen, especially when we are encouraging students to read more.

Both reps I spoke to helped me with my product issues with kindness and patience. Melissa was able to handle the process quickly and even chose the best replacement option. I don’t remember the first reps name but she stayed on the chat with me until I figured out there was a typo in my email when making my purchase and she corrected it for me.
Response was fast and helpful! Resolved very quickly.
Books came at a great time frame and an email response was replied and taken care of.  Thank you!
